query: based on the flight booking interface with filters for airlines, stops, and prices, generate test cases
context_preview:
[Document 1] Screenshot 2025-12-22 at 10.52.24 AM.png
Filters  
Showing 682 results  

Stops

From INR49,925.05  
Direct only 1  
From INR120,147.17  
1 stop max 328  
From INR53,923.13

use_cases.title: Validate Filter by Stops Functionality
use_cases.goal: Ensure the filter by stops functionality works as expected and shows accurate results.
steps: Navigate to the flight search page.
Note the number of results and the price range.
Clear the filter and apply the 'Direct only' filter.
Note the number of results and the price.
Clear the filter and apply the '1 stop max' filter.
Note the number of results and the price range.
expected_results: 682 results are shown for 'Any' stops filter without any price restriction.
1 result is shown for 'Direct only' filter with a price from INR120,147.17.
328 results are shown for '1 stop max' filter with prices from INR53,923.13.
negative_cases: Applying a filter for more than 1 stop when only 'Direct only' and '1 stop max' options are available.
boundary_cases: Applying '1 stop max' filter to check if any flight with more than 1 stop is displayed.

use_cases.title: Validate Filter by Airlines Functionality
use_cases.goal: Ensure the filter by airlines functionality accurately displays results per selected airline.
steps: Navigate to the flight search page.
Apply the 'Etihad Airways' filter and note the number of results.
Repeat the step for Air India, Emirates Airlines, Gulf Air, and British Airways.
expected_results: 188 results are shown for Etihad Airways.
110 results are shown for Air India.
109 results are shown for Emirates Airlines.
26 results are shown for Gulf Air.
16 results are shown for British Airways.
negative_cases: Selecting multiple airlines when the interface is designed for single selection.
boundary_cases: Filtering with the least number of flights (British Airways) to verify the lower limit.

use_cases.title: Validate Flight Times Filter for Departure and Arrival
use_cases.goal: Ensure the flight times filter correctly displays flights based on selected departure and arrival times.
steps: Navigate to the flight search page.
Select a departure time and note the number of available flights.
Select an arrival time and note the number of available flights.
Repeat the step for all listed departure and arrival times.
expected_results: Departure time filters correctly limit the results based on selected time slots.
Arrival time filters accurately reflect the number of flights available for the selected time slots.
negative_cases: Selecting a departure time later than the arrival time.
boundary_cases: Selecting the earliest departure time (12:00 AM) and the latest arrival time (11:59 PM) to test full-day coverage.

assumptions: The user interface allows for individual selection of filters without requiring page reloads.
Filters can be cleared or changed after the initial selection.
